alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 26 at 1:05AM MST until February 26 at 11:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau and Northwest Deserts. * WHEN...Snow will be heavy at times overnight, then taper off early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Watch for downed trees and powerlines as well.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
